textAfterTable: The Sopranos Women's Bada Bing T-Shirt is a tribute to one of the classic settings from the show. This 100%-cotton women's t-shirt features the Bada Bing! logo printed on the front and The Sopranos logo printed on the back bottom right. When you want a drink with old "friends," you have some business to conduct, and you're looking for a "mobbed" scene, there's only one place to go, and one thing to wear: The Sopranos Women's Bada Bing T-Shirt. S M L XL XXL Bust 15" 16" 17" 18" 19" Waist 14" 15" 16" 17" 18" Length 24" 25" 26" 27" 28" Doubling the Bust measurement will give the chest size. REVIEW SNAPSHOT® by PowerReviews DA - HBO The Sopranos Women's Bada Bing Slim Fit T-Shirt   1.0 (based on 1 review)
